content.question: Define economic liberalization.Describe a measure that a democratic or authoritarian government could use to liberalize its economy.Explain one reason a government would choose to liberalize its economy.Explain why a decision to introduce economic liberalization policies might affect social cleavages.

frqParts.text: Define economic liberalization.Describe a measure that a democratic or authoritarian government could use to liberalize its economy.Explain one reason a government would choose to liberalize its economy.Explain why a decision to introduce economic liberalization policies might affect social cleavages.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
